articles.title: Dozens of volunteers canvas Boston for homeless people outside as blizzard bears down on the city
articles.description:
“Fortunately, they're not seeing as many people as usual on the street, so that's a good sign that people would have opted to come inside.”

The post Dozens of volunteers canvas Boston for homeless people outside as blizzard bears down on the city appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Dozens of volunteers canvassed Boston to assist homeless individuals during the blizzard.
Fewer people were seen on the streets, indicating more opted for indoor shelter.
The community effort highlights local support for vulnerable populations during severe weather.

articles.title: 50 percent of departing Boston Logan Airport flights canceled Tuesday
articles.description:
50 percent of flights have been canceled out of Logan Tuesday, but Amtrak is hopeful that service will return for Tuesday’s morning commute.

The post 50 percent of departing Boston Logan Airport flights canceled Tuesday appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: 50% of departing flights from Logan Airport were canceled on Tuesday.
Amtrak anticipates service restoration for Tuesday's morning commute.
Travel disruptions may affect Boston residents relying on air travel.

articles.title: To trade or not to trade? Bruins must make their call with Viktor Arvidsson.
articles.description:
With four games before the NHL trade deadline, the Bruins need to make a ruling on several assets.

The post To trade or not to trade? Bruins must make their call with Viktor Arvidsson. appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Bruins face decision on trading Viktor Arvidsson before NHL deadline on March 3.
Team has four games remaining to assess player performance and trade options.
Potential trade could impact Bruins' playoff strategy and local fan engagement.
